oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Feild, Erica
Lorés Sanz, María Rosa
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Descriptions of Goya's Paintings at the Museum of Zaragoza: English Translation and Commentary
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This project is comprised of a translation of the descriptions found on the walls of the Museum of Zaragoza, an analysis of the original text, and comments regarding the difficulties of the translation and the corresponding solutions employed by the translator.
